sections.description: Wedding Photography is a responsive and powerful WordPress theme with a beautiful design. The theme has many options and settings to give you complete control over your website layouts and design. This is a good choice for both photography companies and photographers because creating a photography website using our theme is as easy as possible. You don't need coding knowledge, you can create a modern website simply by using the WordPress admin panel. This is one of the best WordPress themes for wedding photographers. If you want a photo blog or even an online store where you can sell your albums or photos in different frames, you can do it with our theme. The theme is fully integrated with WooCommerce, so you don't need any additional steps to create an online store. You need two things: the Wedding Photography theme and the WooCommerce plugin. Our theme has many advantages, so let's mention some of them. First of all, the theme has a great option called “Custom Homepage”. The custom homepage can be enabled in the customizer section and displayed on the main page of the website. In the theme customizer panel, go to the "Homepage Settings" panel, then select the option "Your latest posts" for the "Your homepage displays" setting. After that, go to the "Custom Homepage" panel and activate the option "Enable custom homepage". The free version offers three custom homepage sections (banner section, call to action section, and latest posts section), while the premium version offers five more sections (WooCommerce section, sales section, achievements section, advantages section, and services section). WordPress Wedding Photography theme has different layouts for the header, posts/pages, blog and search pages, and footer. There are five different themes available for the footer. All elements and sections of the theme are customizable, so you can change text colors and font sizes, background colors, choose different animation effects for header and top bar elements, and much more. You can check out the theme page or demo page to learn more and see the theme in action.
